testemonials.title: It's good
testemonials.text: It has all I needed from a diary app, and it is very easy to use. I enjoy it.

testemonials.title: Awesome
testemonials.text: I used a lot of diary apps in the past but I could't stick with any. This one is simple, easy to use and most of all fun. I love it.

testemonials.title: Just alright
testemonials.text: It is ok, but nothing special. I love some features, others could be better.

testemonials.title: Revolutionary
testemonials.text: I love the ability to statistically review all my logs. It helped me a lot to manage and change my daily habits and it actually improved my life. I am grateful.

testemonials.title: Simple and enjoyable
testemonials.text: I just love how simple and enjoyable it is.

testemonials.title: Too simpe
testemonials.text: I find it too simple and I wish it had more features and could be connected with other apps so we could import our data , like Apple watch...

testemonials.title: So-so
testemonials.text: Somefeatures are amazing, some I don't like. What I love about it is that you can disable any feture you don't like.

testemonials.title: Good for me
testemonials.text: I find it good for me and my needs. Maybe not for everyone.

testemonials.title: Need more
testemonials.text: I love how it looks and how easy to use it is, but I wanted more from a diary app.
